Package arcade.patch.env.component

Class PatchComponentSitesGraphFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSitesGraphFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchComponentSitesGraphFactoryRect, PatchComponentSitesGraphFactoryTri
    public abstract class PatchComponentSitesGraphFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for building a Graph for PatchComponentSitesGraph.

    Graph can be initialized in two ways:

    • pattern layout that matches the structure used by PatchComponentSitesPattern
    • root layout grown from a specified root system using motifs

        Parameters:
        graph - the graph instance
        node0 - the node the motif starts at
        dir - the direction code of the root
        type - the root type
